item.title: 中国调查欧盟猪肉进口，矛头直指欧盟最大卖家
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，中国已将来自欧盟的三家公司置于对该集团猪肉产品反倾销调查的中心。【原文：China has put three companies from the European Union at the center of its anti-dumping investigation into pork products from the bloc, the Commerce Ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: 阿曼财富基金支持的港口运营商将亚洲交易提上日程
item.description: 由阿曼主权财富基金支持的阿西亚德集团（Asyad Group）正在寻求购买或运营东南亚、印度和非洲的港口，以扩大其在世界航运市场的份额。【原文：Asyad Group, backed by Oman’s sovereign wealth fund, is looking to buy or operate ports in southeast Asia, India and Africa as it seeks a bigger share of the world shipping market.】

item.title: 报告认为欧盟凝聚基金需要根本性改革
item.description: 根据 ZEW 的一份报告，欧盟耗资 3920 亿欧元用于消除由 27 个成员国组成的集团中较贫穷和较富裕地区之间差异的工具需要进行彻底改革。【原文：The European Union’s €392 billion tool to smooth out differences between the poorer and wealthier regions of the 27-member bloc need an overhaul, according to a ZEW report.】

item.title: 意大利和法国借款人重返德国债务市场
item.description: 德国债务市场正在向德国以外的公司重新开放，2024 年法国和意大利借款人的融资额超过了去年全年。【原文：A German debt market is opening back up for companies beyond Germany, with more French and Italian borrowers raising financing in 2024 than over the whole of last year.】

item.title: 普拉博沃在财政部的侄子保证财政连续性
item.description: 印尼新任财政部副部长托马斯-迪万多诺（Thomas Djiwandono）是当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的侄子，他承诺将顺利完成财政交接，同时保证不会提高债务率或预算赤字。【原文：Indonesia’s new Deputy Finance Minister Thomas Djiwandono, nephew of President-elect Prabowo Subianto, is promising a smooth fiscal handover while pledging that he won’t raise the debt ratio or the budget deficit.】

item.title: 英国新劳动力调查因新数据问题推迟至 2025 年进行
item.description: 在国家统计局发现新的 "转型 "调查存在问题后，英格兰银行的政策制定者在明年之前将不得不使用低于标准的就业市场数据。【原文：Bank of England policymakers will have to operate with sub-standard jobs market data until next year after the Office for National Statistics uncovered problems with the new “transformed” survey that will replace the flawed existing release.】

item.title: ION 将于本周完成以 15 亿美元收购意大利 Prelios 公司的交易
item.description: ION 集团与意大利当局就收购资产管理公司 Prelios SpA 的交易进行了数月的反复磋商后，最快将于本周完成收购。【原文：ION Group is set to complete the acquisition of asset manager Prelios SpA as soon as this week, following months of back-and-forth with Italian authorities on the deal.】

item.title: 乌克兰开始与债券持有人进行第二轮限制性会谈
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一批乌克兰债券持有人已签署了非披露协议，将与政府就 200 多亿美元的债务重组问题展开第二轮正式会谈。【原文：A group of Ukraine’s bondholders has signed non-disclosure agreements to begin a second round of official talks with the government about restructuring more than $20 billion of debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国实际工资终于回到金融危机前的峰值
item.description: 英国的实际工资终于回到了近二十年前金融危机爆发前的峰值，这对承诺提高生活水平的基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）新工党政府来说是一个鼓舞。【原文：UK real wages finally returned to their peak just before the financial crisis almost two decades ago, a boost to Keir Starmer’s new Labour government that has pledged to improve living standards.】

item.title: 津巴布韦啤酒制造商以当地货币缴纳 5,500 万美元税款的申请失败
item.description: 津巴布韦啤酒生产商和可口可乐公司装瓶商 Delta Corp. 不服以当地货币支付 5500 万美元税款的上诉败诉，津巴布韦最高法院命令该公司以美元支付税款。【原文：Delta Corp., a Zimbabwean beer maker and Coca-Cola Co. bottler, lost an appeal against paying $55 million of taxes in local currency, with the nation’s top court ordering the company to pay in US dollars.】

item.title: 印度瞄准每年 1100 亿美元外国直接投资助推经济发展
item.description: 印度政府投资促进机构的一位高级官员表示，印度的目标是将每年的外国直接投资额提高 50%以上，以帮助促进经济增长。【原文：India is aiming to boost annual foreign direct investment by more than 50% to help lift economic growth, according to a top official at the government’s investment promotion agency.】

item.title: 菲律宾将在南海岛屿开发机场
item.description: 菲律宾正在其占领的南中国海的一个岛屿上修建机场，因为这个东南亚国家主张其在争议水域的主权。【原文：The Philippines is developing an airport on an island it occupies in the South China Sea, as the Southeast Asian nation asserts it claims in the disputed waters.】

item.title: 乌克兰计划制定允许暂停偿还外债的法律
item.description: 乌克兰计划通过一项法律，允许政府暂停偿还外债，因为该国与其国际债权人正就 200 多亿美元债券的重组条件争论不休。【原文：Ukraine plans to adopt a law allowing the government to impose a moratorium on foreign debt payments as the country and its international creditors wrangle over terms for restructuring more than $20 billion in bonds.】

item.title: S.BD 称非洲希望通过养老基金促进工业化
item.description: 据《商业日报》援引贸易部长帕克斯-陶的话报道，南非政府正在考虑修改立法，以迫使养老基金和资产管理公司将资金投入到产业政策项目中。【原文：South Africa’s government is considering legislative changes to compel pension funds and asset managers to plow money into industrial policy projects, Business Day reported, citing Trade Minister Parks Tau.】

item.title: 报道称越南国家主席杜林被委派监督党的工作
item.description: 越南国家主席杜林在网站上发表声明称，在总书记阮富仲优先考虑治疗健康问题期间，他将暂时代行监督共产党中央委员会和政治局的职责。【原文：Vietnam President To Lam is stepping in temporarily to oversee the Communist Party’s Central Committee and Politburo while General Secretary Nguyen Phu Trong prioritizes treatment for his health, according to a statement on the website.】

item.title: 中国需求进一步下降，瑞士钟表出口减少
item.description: 由于中国和香港对高档和奢侈钟表的需求大幅放缓，6 月份瑞士钟表出口急剧下降。【原文：Swiss watch exports fell sharply in June after a significant slowdown in demand for premium and luxury timepieces in China and Hong Kong worsened.】

item.title: 中国国家队 ETF 在三中全会宣读前跃升
item.description: 中国股市周四午后反弹，与此同时，所谓的 "国家队 "青睐的几只交易所交易基金的交易量也有所增加。【原文：China’s stock markets staged a mid-morning rebound on Thursday, coinciding with increased activity in several exchange-traded funds that the so-called national team is known to favor.】

item.title: 盎格鲁计划在经济复苏缓慢的情况下削减更多钻石产量
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）正寻求削减更多的钻石产量，因为该行业仍在为需求疲软和库存过多而苦苦挣扎。【原文：Anglo American Plc is looking to cut more diamond production as the industry continues to struggle with weak demand and too much stock.】

item.title: 非洲前哨纳米比亚准备成为新的石油热点
item.description: 在纳米比亚主要港口沃尔维斯湾一个繁忙的码头外，经济繁荣的种子正在播下。【原文：Off a busy pier in Namibia’s main port of Walvis Bay, the seeds of an economic boom are being planted.】

item.title: 英国工资增长放缓，显示就业市场疲软
item.description: 英国工资增长率 20 个月来首次下滑至 6% 以下，这是劳动力市场降温的最新迹象，因为英国央行正在考虑是否能在下个月降息。【原文：UK wage growth slipped below 6% for the first time in 20 months, the latest sign of a cooling labor market as the Bank of England considers whether it can cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 以色列资产因对停火谈判日益乐观而反弹
item.description: 以色列可能与哈马斯达成停火协议的乐观情绪日益高涨，推动了该国市场的反弹。【原文：Growing optimism that Israel could reach a cease-fire deal with Hamas is driving a rebound in the country’s markets.】

item.title: 意大利安杰里尼公司希望通过大型制药公司合并来促进药物管线的发展
item.description: 意大利制药商安吉里尼制药公司（Angelini Pharma SpA）正在关注三家美国生物技术公司的潜在合并，这将扩大其全球业务版图，并帮助其实施雄心勃勃的增长计划。【原文：Italian drugmaker Angelini Pharma SpA is looking at three US biotechs for a potential merger that would expand its global footprint and help it execute an ambitious growth plan.】

item.title: 基金发行量锐减显示出对 ESG 的反弹
item.description: 在全球最大的几家资产管理公司中，ESG 基金的发行悄然停滞。【原文：At some of the world’s biggest asset managers, ESG fund launches are quietly stalling.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：工资增长放缓至 5.7%，英镑保持稳定
item.description: 7 月 8 日，伦敦的通勤者。摄影师：Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg【原文：Commuters in London on July 8. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 沃尔沃表示，卡车需求疲软，价格上涨有助于回款
item.description: 沃尔沃公司（Volvo AB）公布的第二季度盈利好于预期，因为在主要市场增长放缓的情况下，这家卡车制造商通过提高价格成功地捍卫了利润率。【原文：Volvo AB reported better-than-expected earnings for the second quarter as the truckmaker managed to defend its margins through higher prices as key markets slowed.】

item.title: ABB因数据中心需求而创下利润率新高，并确认了指导目标
item.description: 在数据中心强劲需求的推动下，ABB 有限公司第二季度的利润率达到创纪录的 19%，抵消了其他业务领域的下滑。【原文：ABB Ltd. recorded a record 19% margin in the second quarter driven by strong demand from data centers, offsetting declines in other business areas.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车因中国电动汽车关税不安全调整销售预测
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Car AB）小幅下调了今年的汽车销量预期，原因是欧盟因支持中国电动汽车产业而与中国发生贸易冲突可能造成的影响。【原文：Volvo Car AB slightly lowered its auto-sales forecast for this year due to the potential impact of the European Union’s trade conflict with China over support for its electric-vehicle industry.】

item.title: 船只在阿曼附近倾覆，一名海员死亡，九人获救
item.description: 阿曼海事安全中心称，本周早些时候，一艘石油产品油轮在阿曼杜克姆海岸附近倾覆，造成一名船员死亡，九人获救。【原文：One crew member died while nine were rescued after an oil-products tanker capsized off Oman’s coast of Duqm earlier this week, the country’s Maritime Security Centre said.】

item.title: 特朗普的赔率让交易员将亚洲分为敌友两派
item.description: 亚洲的股票交易者正在加紧特朗普交易，为这位美国前总统可能的第二个任期做准备，这可能会在该地区产生赢家和输家。【原文：Stock traders in Asia are ramping up the Trump trade in preparation for a potential second term for the former US president, which will likely create winners and losers in the region.】

item.title: 诺华上调 2024 年盈利预测，原因是新大片药物需求旺盛
item.description: 诺华公司（Novartis AG）今年第二次上调利润预期，原因是其大片银屑病和心力衰竭治疗药物的销售额攀升。【原文：Novartis AG raised its profit forecast for the second time this year as sales climbed for its blockbuster psoriasis and heart failure treatments.】
